ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.models
Class ThreadComment

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.models.ThreadComment

public class ThreadComment
extends java.lang.Object

ThreadComment is a model class that handles all operations of threads in the application. It aggregates a Comment object and adds thread specific fields: title, id

getDistanceFrom

public double getDistanceFrom(GeoLocation g)
Determines the distance between the Thread (defined by the GeoLocation of the top comment) and the provided GeoLocation in terms of coordinates.

Parameters:
g - The GeoLocation we want to determine the distance from.
Returns:
The distance, in terms of coordinates, between the Thread and the passed GeoLocation.

getTimeFrom

public double getTimeFrom(java.util.Date d)
Determines the time passed between when the Thread was posted and the passed Date in terms of number of hours.

Parameters:
d - The Date we are comparing with.
Returns:
The number of hours between when the Thread was posted and the passed Date. Returns a minimum of 0.5.

getScoreFromUser

public double getScoreFromUser(GeoLocation g)
Determines the score of a thread relevant to

Parameters:
g - The GeoLocation relevant to sorting. In sorting, the Thread.sortLoc GeoLocation of the sorting thread is used and should be set in the fragment.
Returns:
The score of the comment in relation to the user's location and current time.

sortComments

public void sortComments(int tag)
Sorts thread comments according to the tag passed.

Parameters:
tag - Tag to sort comments by

sortComments

public static void sortComments(java.util.ArrayList<Comment> comments,
                                int tag)
Sorts a thread's comments according to the tag passed. This will be moved into its own class, this is temporary.

Parameters:
comments - Comment list to sort
tag - Tag to sort comments by
